articles.author: Nima Elbagir,Eve Brennan
articles.title: US sanctions Wagner in Mali, confirms CNN investigation on support to Sudan paramilitaries - CNN
articles.description: The US Treasury has sanctioned the head of the Wagner private military group in Mali, Ivan Maslov, as part of its pushback against Wagner activities in Africa funneling support to Russia’s war against Ukraine, according to a press release published on Thursda…
articles.content: The US Treasury has sanctioned the head of the Wagner private military group in Mali, Ivan Maslov, as part of its pushback against Wagner activities in Africa funneling support to Russias war against… [+3342 chars]
